sources.title: Grand Prix (1966) James Garner, Eva Marie Saint
sources.description: Four racing drivers from England, France, Italy, and the USA battle for the world championship at European racetracks.....Â  The fascinating, albeit ultimately tiring, racing footage of the film, produced with the elaborate Cinerama process, is tenuously held together by the richly constructed stories of the heroes' lovesickness and happiness.

metadata.Plot: American Grand Prix driver Pete Aron is fired by his Jordan-BRM racing team after a crash at Monaco that injures his British teammate, Scott Stoddard. While Stoddard struggles to recover, Aron begins to drive for the Japanese Yamura team, and becomes romantically involved with Stoddard's estranged wife.
metadata.Writer: Robert Alan Aurthur, John Frankenheimer, William Hanley
metadata.Actors: James Garner, Eva Marie Saint, Yves Montand
